headline: Synthetix Shifts Focus to Coinbase’s Base Network, Closes Perpetual Markets on Arbitrum
summary: Synthetix has announced that it will transition its perpetual markets on the Arbitrum network to a close-only mode.

raw.headline: Synthetix Shifts Focus to Coinbase’s Base Network, Closes Perpetual Markets on Arbitrum
raw.summary: Synthetix has announced that it will transition its perpetual markets on the Arbitrum network to a close-only mode.

headline: XRP, XLM and DOGE See Recovery in Stateside Demand
summary: These tokens are once again prices more or less the same on Coinbase and Binance.

headline: Coinbase faces CFTC scrutiny in ongoing Polymarket investigation
summary: The crypto betting platform is banned in the U.S. but gained increased prominence during the 2024 U.S. presidential election.
